Class AbsorberCount

  • java.lang.Object
    • greenfoot.Actor
      • AbsorberCount

  • public class AbsorberCount
extends greenfoot.Actor
    The statistics holder for both value and number of hits. Note that each absorber with the same value should utilize the same AbsorberCount object, so there can be more Absorbers than there are AbsorberCount objects. You probably do not want to modify this class, although you are welcome to do so.
    Version:
    11/2019
    Author:
    Stephen Blythe
